responses.rationale: The segment describes a risk fact, not capability or preparedness.
The segment describes an event (deaths), not capability or preparedness.
Describes a planned action ('planning to cull') without explicit reassurance.
Describes an implemented safeguard ('blocking access') without explicit reassurance.
The segment describes facts about the virus and location, not capability or preparedness.
The segment describes historical facts about the virus, not capability or preparedness.
Describes a past action ('have already been culled') as a response measure without explicit reassurance.
The segment describes a potential cause, not capability or preparedness.
The segment describes industry size facts, not capability or preparedness.
The segment describes industry size facts, not capability or preparedness.
The segment describes industry facts, not capability or preparedness.
The segment describes data about supplies, not capability or preparedness.
The segment describes industry size facts, not capability or preparedness.
The segment describes industry size facts, not capability or preparedness.
The segment describes industry facts, not capability or preparedness.
The segment describes historical facts, not capability or preparedness.
The segment describes a past event (killed), not capability or preparedness.
The segment describes locations of cases, not capability or preparedness.
Describes a safeguard/capability ('Cooking... kills bacteria and viruses') without explicit reassurance.
The segment describes consequences/facts, not capability or preparedness.
The segment describes consequences/facts, not capability or preparedness.
Describes actions being taken ('working... to prevent', 'heightening safety measures') without explicit reassurance.
Describes recommendations ('review their biosecurity', 'prevent contact') and actions ('working jointly') without explicit reassurance.
The segment describes consequences/facts, not capability or preparedness.
The segment describes industry size facts, not capability or preparedness.
Describes an action being taken ('working 'diligently' to prevent') without explicit reassurance.
The segment describes data about supplies, not capability or preparedness.
The segment describes locations and dates of findings, not capability or preparedness.
The segment describes location and date of detection, not capability or preparedness.
